G

Gate - Class in towersim.ground
Represents an aircraft gate with facilities for a single aircraft to be parked.
Gate(int) - Constructor for class Gate
Creates a new Gate with the given unique gate number.
getAircraft() - Method in class ControlTower
Returns a list of all aircraft currently managed by this control tower.
getAircraftAtGate() - Method in class Gate
Returns the aircraft currently parked at the gate, or null if there is no aircraft parked.
getAircraftInfoText() - Method in class ViewModel
Returns the property storing the contents of the aircraft info text box.
getAircraftInOrder() - Method in class AircraftQueue
Returns a list containing all aircraft in the queue, in order.
getAircraftInOrder() - Method in class LandingQueue
Returns a list containing all aircraft in the queue, in order.
getAircraftInOrder() - Method in class TakeoffQueue
Returns a list containing all aircraft in the queue, in order.
getAircraftLanding() - Method in class ViewModel
Returns the property storing the aircraft that is currently landing.
getAircraftTakingOff() - Method in class ViewModel
Returns the property storing the aircraft that is currently taking off.
getCallsign() - Method in class Aircraft
Returns the callsign of the aircraft.
getCharacteristics() - Method in class Aircraft
Returns this aircraft's characteristics.
getControlTower() - Method in class ViewModel
Returns the control tower linked to this view model.
getCurrentTask() - Method in class TaskList
Returns the current task in the list.
getDescription() - Method in enum TaskType
Returns the written description of this task type.
getDroneAlertHandler() - Method in class ViewModel
Returns an event handler for when the "Drone Alert" button is clicked.
getDroneClearHandler() - Method in class ViewModel
Returns an event handler for when the "Clear Drone Alert" button is clicked.
getFindSuitableGateHandler() - Method in class ViewModel
Returns an event handler for when the "Find Gate for Selected Aircraft" button is clicked.
getFuelAmount() - Method in class Aircraft
Returns the current amount of fuel onboard, in litres.
getFuelPercentRemaining() - Method in class Aircraft
Returns the percentage of fuel remaining, rounded to the nearest whole percentage, 0 to 100.
getGateNumber() - Method in class Gate
Returns this gate's gate number.
getGates() - Method in class Terminal
Returns a list of all gates in the terminal.
getLandingQueue() - Method in class ControlTower
Returns the queue of aircraft waiting to land.
getLoadingAircraft() - Method in class ControlTower
Returns the mapping of loading aircraft to their remaining load times.

getLoadPercent() - Method in class Task
Returns the load percentage specified when constructing the task, or 0 if none was specified.
getNextTask() - Method in class TaskList
Returns the task in the list that comes after the current task.
getNumTerminals() - Method in class ViewModel
Returns the property storing the number of terminals managed by the control tower.
